!*> Setup
!include Setup

For the test, it is necessary to create a couple of accounts.
|process member                                                                                                                                         |
|account name|credential|credential type|action|member id|public key|new account name|new credential|member role|member id?|return code?|return message?|
|admin       |admin     |PASSPHRASE     |CREATE|null     |null      |user1           |password1     |ADMIN      |=~/\S{36}/|${SUCCESS}  |Ok             |
|user1       |password1 |null           |LOGIN |null     |null      |null            |sessionkey    |null       |null      |${SUCCESS}  |Ok             |

*!

!2 '''!-CWS-! Process !-DataType-! Request'''
The !-CWS-! Process Data Type can be made by 

|process dataType                                              |
|credential|action |name |type    |return code?|return message?|
|sessionkey|PROCESS|type1|MIMEType|${SUCCESS}  |Ok             |
|sessionkey|PROCESS|type1|Object2 |${SUCCESS}  |Ok             |
|sessionkey|PROCESS|type2|Object42|${SUCCESS}  |Ok             |
|sessionkey|DELETE |type2|null    |${SUCCESS}  |Ok             |

|fetch dataTypes                                                                                                                                                                    |
|credential|data types?                                                                                                                                |return code?|return message?|
|sessionkey|!-[DataType{typeName='data', type='Data Object'}, DataType{typeName='folder', type='Folder'}, DataType{typeName='type1', type='Object2'}]-!|${SUCCESS}  |Ok             |
